Writer¶

class oct.Writer¶

Bases: object

A writing object for saving processed images as they are reconstructed

Methods

__init__()

Initialize self.

appendComplexImage(image, data, frameType[, …])

Appends single complex reconstructed tomogram image :param image: Processed image to write :type image: array :param data: data information object :type data: object :param framteType: type of image frame, ie.

appendImage(image, data, frameType[, filenameIn])

Handles the appending of single reconstructed image :param image: Processed image to write :type image: array :param data: data information object :type data: object :param framteType: type of image frame, ie.

appendRealImage(image, data, frameType[, …])

Appends single real reconstructed images to the file formats designated in data.storageSettings[‘storageFileType’] (str) :param image: dictionary of all processed images :type image: array :param data: data information object :type data: object :param framteType: type of image frame, ie.

Appends single real reconstructed images to the file formats designated in data.storageSettings[‘storageFileType’] (str) :param image: dictionary of all processed images :type image: array :param data: data information object :type data: object :param framteType: type of image frame, ie.

writeMetadata(data, frameType[, filenameIn])

Handles the writing of metadata for .mgh outputs prior to beginning reconstruction :param data: data information object :type data: object :param framteType: type of image frame, ie.
